workflow.title: Initial Consultation
workflow.description: We'll meet to discuss your vision, style preferences, and wedding day timeline. This is where we get to know each other and ensure we're the perfect fit.

workflow.title: Contract & Deposit
workflow.description: Once we've agreed on the package and details, you'll sign the contract and pay a 30% deposit to secure your date.

workflow.title: Engagement Session
workflow.description: If included in your package, we'll schedule your engagement session. This helps us build rapport and get comfortable working together.

workflow.title: Pre-Wedding Planning
workflow.description: About a month before your wedding, we'll finalize the timeline, shot list, and any special requests. Final payment is due two weeks before the wedding.

workflow.title: Your Wedding Day
workflow.description: I'll arrive early to capture all the special moments from getting ready through the reception. Just relax and enjoy your day!

workflow.title: Photo Delivery
workflow.description: Your edited photos will be delivered via an online gallery where you can view, download, and share. Albums will be designed and delivered separately.
